name: promisees
description: Promise visualization playground for the adventurous

scripts.build: cp node_modules/babel-core/browser.js dist/babel.js ; npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.scripts: browserify -dvo dist/demo.js demo.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/demo.min.js dist/demo.js
scripts.start: watchify -dvo dist/demo.min.js demo.js & stylus --include-css --include . -w demo.styl --import node_modules/nib -o dist & static-server . --port ${PORT:='3000'}
scripts.styles: stylus --include-css --include . demo.styl --import node_modules/nib -o dist && cleancss dist/demo.css -o dist/demo.css
scripts.deploy: npm run build ; git add . ; git commit -am 'autogenerated build commit' ; git push

author: Nicolas Bevacqua <nicolasbevacqua@gmail.com> (http://bevacqua.io/)
